description:
An economical bottom bracket tool for fast, smooth installation and removal of splined 20-tooth bottom bracket cups.

  • Fits 20-tooth pattern on Shimano®, Truvativ®, Race Face®, FSA®, and others
  • Clears the oversized spindles of ISIS Drive™ and Octalink®
  • Compatible with 32mm wrench
name: Park Tool BBT-32 Bottom Bracket Tool
